name: Present Time
description:
One day, you see an unusual present outside your door with a short note attached to it... Turns out it's a chronometer which allows you to control time! You can now go back to the past in order to bring the treasures of the ancient past to the present time! However, there is a catch: You will need to act quick if you want to collect as many treasures as possible since your time is limited! Luckily, there are more presents scattered around to help you...

This is my entry for the Extra Credits Holiday 2018 Game Jam, which also happens to be my first game jam experience. The font is Pixel Mix by Andrew Tyler, everything else is made by me.

I'm looking forward for your feedback!
